about_the_game:
Jigoro is a lewd match 3 game for PC.

Jigoro is awoken by their fairy financial officer, and informed of the sorry state of their business. They set out to turn things around.
Jigoro uses their demonic charms to flirt and seduce their way through business negotiations, mixing business with pleasure, and fulfilling each partner's hidden desires.

  • 4 cute and attractive ladies to court, each with their own unique personality and preferences.

  • Some girls have particular needs, making their negotiations require a completely new way of thinking to succeed.

  • Visual Novel style cutscenes, with getting animated portraits (made with Live2D) for the girls.

  • Juiced up match 3 gameplay, with consumable powerups and permanent upgrades as you funnel your hard earned cash back into your business.

  • Streamsafe mode - When enabled all the anime tiddy and otherlewd parts are covered up.


The girls.



Alice, 19
Alice runs her own bakery/cafe business.

Bright, bubbly, and buxom, Alice charms her way into the hearts of her customers.
Her store sells top quality confectionery at commoner prices.



Karin, 29

Karin made a name for herself as the Adventurers' Guild's administrator.
With her hands on approach and doing the work of 3 people, Karin quickly rose up the ranks to her current position.
She always carries her pocket watch and times her schedule out to the minute, so try not to waste her time.
(you can't gain extra moves when negotiating with her)




Suna, 23

Suna is a free spirit, just looking for a good time.
Having moved away from her desert village, Suna spends her time looking for new things to try.
On most days she can be found bathing in the park's fountain, much to the guardsmens' annoyance.



Sister Lina, 21
Modest and hard working, spends her days toiling away for the church, and babysitting on her days off.

highlighted.name: The first of many satisfied clients!

content_descriptors.notes: nudity, graphic depictions of sex, all consensual and happy.

name: Jigoro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP or later
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews:
“It's a really good game! It's worth the price, and while it's lacking in some parts, if you're looking for a light, non-serious game to play through real quick, I would highly suggest this one. The art and sound is on point, so with some more detail and attention added to the story, it would really stick out and be even better!”
8/10 – Degenerate Studios
short_description: Earn money, unlock upgrades, and flirt your way through business negotiations in this cute and lewd match 3 game.
